channel.title: The "pointless" topic
channel.description:
Post stuff thats, well pointless!(like pointless games,websites,real life stuff,etc)
Reason for this pointless topic, to see what all people think it pointless.
^This topic is not pointless, just full of pointless stuff.
http://www.something.com/ <-Very pointless but a lot of people know it.
BTW whoever locks this, for it being pointless has to agree to be my wife(guy or not)

item.title: The "pointless" topic
item.dc:creator: @pure2ownage Pure_
item.description:
@pure2ownage wrote:

[quote=“jmood128, post:11, topic:340682”][quote author=krackkid link=topic=437053.msg3211592#msg3211592 date=1274301332]

I eat mint cookies sorry. Plus girl scout cookies make your cookies look like shit. Sorry. :rolleyes:

^Buying cookies are also pointless, there little girls(steal them>.<)(By them I mean the girls)(well maybe the cookies too)
[/quote]

Who says I buy them?

Pointless Stuff List:

[ul][li]Girls[/li]
[li]Guys[/li]
[li]WoW[/li]
[li]Magic (card game)[/li]
[li]YuGioh (I still play it though :|)[/li]
[li]School lunches (What the fuck do they make there shit with?)[/li]
[li]School prep rallys (There really gay)[/li]
[li]School homework[/li]
[li]RuneScape bans[/li]
[li]RuneScape banning macroers[/li]
[li]RuneScape’s new updates[/li][/ul][/quote]

[ul][li]Girls - I liekz pussy.[/li]
[li]Guys - I dont liekz dick.[/li]
[li]WoW - FTW[/li]
[li]Magic (card game) - no idea wtf this is[/li]
[li]YuGioh (I still play it though :|) - YUGIOH FTW!"£$%$I SUMMON MOPARISTHEBEST 10STR MONSTA. 5K ATK OMG[/li]
[li]School lunches (What the fuck do they make there shit with?) - cheap shit from bins, graveyards and cans.[/li]
[li]School prep rallys (There really gay) - no idea.[/li]
[li]School homework - this is just fucking pointless[/li]
[li]RuneScape bans - thiis is shit[/li]
[li]RuneScape banning macroers - L0L GF[/li]
[li]RuneScape’s new updates - always faggy since 562.[/li][/ul]

and this is my pointless crap. << you just wasted about 2 secs of your life reading through my bullcrap
